definition: to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon
word/statement/speech/lyrics/CL:組|组[zu3],個|个[ge4]/a form of lyric poetry, flourishing in the Song dynasty 宋朝|宋朝[Song4 chao2]/CL:首[shou3]
interrogative pronoun (誰|谁, 什麼|什么, 哪兒|哪儿 etc)

sentences.english: The second chapter is the personal pronoun in Jiaozhou Dialect.
sentences.chinese: 第二章研究膠州話中的人稱代詞。
對名詞性物主代詞進行總結。

sentences.english: Most transitive verbs can take a reflexive pronoun.
sentences.chinese: 大部分及物動詞可接反身代詞作賓語。

sentences.english: The interrogative pronoun is plentiful in Zhangzi.
sentences.chinese: 《莊子》中疑問代詞使用十分豐富。

sentences.english: Reflexive pronouns can be direct or indirect object.
sentences.chinese: 反身代詞可作直接或間接賓語。

sentences.english: Chapter II is about anaphora of first person pronouns.
sentences.chinese: 第二章，第一人稱代詞回指研究。

sentences.english: "I" as the first personal pronoun doesn't have differences between case and number.
sentences.chinese: “我”作爲第一人稱代詞沒有格位和數的區別。

sentences.english: At last, we discuss that interrogatives sometimes represent the definite information.
sentences.chinese: 最後探討了疑問代詞有時表示一定確定性的信息。

sentences.english: We will also learn about reflexive pronouns.
sentences.chinese: 此外還將學習反身代詞。

sentences.english: Most transitive verbs can take a reflexive pronoun as object.
sentences.chinese: 大部分及物動詞可跟反身代詞作賓語。

sentences.english: A “Rest Room” is also a toilet.
Generally, place word should not be missed and noun and person pronoun may add to place word sentences.
sentences.chinese: 存現句的處所詞語前後有時有名詞或人稱代詞出現。

sentences.english: The present experiment investigated whether the processing of pronouns is affected by the lexical frequency of their antecedents.
sentences.chinese: 採用眼動分析法考察先行詞詞頻對代詞加工的影響。

sentences.english: Changed "Name Displaying" in "Whisper System" by instead of pronoun.
sentences.chinese: 改變“名稱顯示”“私聊系統”由代詞代替。

sentences.english: Besides, I think you have made the use of determiners perfectly clear.
sentences.chinese: 此外，我認爲你們已經能十分準確地使用指代詞。

sentences.english: Chapter IV is about anaphora of third person pronouns.
sentences.chinese: 第四章，第三人稱代詞回指研究。

definition: part of speech (noun, verb, adjective etc)/lexical category
to make far-fetched claims (idiom)/to offer outlandish explanations
my limited view (lit. view through a thin tube)/my limited understanding/my opinion (humble)
